attributes.action: Allow more money to be dedicated to develop more basketball facilities in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Basketball is a growing sport in London, even in the U.K, however i wish there were more basetball facilities available for youth and adults to play in, there are some outdoor basketball courts available but most the time its occupied by footballers.
My request is to allow more money to be spent to  develop indoor training facilities and courts to allow proper training and even local events.
